title: Riot help !
body: My account was hacked and now I can not log in or retrieve my password! When I was asked to solve the 2100 code and now I can not log in to see my ticket! Please my account

replies.body: That's no good! Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can so that they can get started with the recovery process. You'll need to verify yourself as the original account creator by answering some questions about the account, but after that they can help you make sure your account is safe and secure ^_^!
